# AAVE V3

![AAVE screenshot](/img/templates/aave_1.png)

![AAVE screenshot](/img/templates/aave_2.png)

A two pages template with `ContractRead`, `ContractWrite` and `ERC20TokenApproval`. This example also showcase how to [build applications that works on multiple chains](https://docs.fastdapp.xyz/docs/variables/connectedChain). This templates works on Ethereum mainnet, Optimism, Arbitrum and Polygon.

* [Example](https://fastdapp.xyz/app/aave)
* [Landing page source](https://fastdapp.xyz/editor?template=aave)
* [Pool page](https://fastdapp.xyz/editor?template=aave_pool)
